Class Book

java.lang.Object
Book
public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
Implements an Encapsulated Book object with helper methods. The book object holds its own serial number, name of the book, status if book is checked out, and the date the book was published. This class also has a helper method leapYear() and two overridden methods equals() and toString().
Author:
Sahreb Aamir, Joshua Sennett

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book()
      Constructor for Book object with no parameters. Only checkedOut is explicitly set to false within the constructor.

  • Method Details

    • leapYear

      public static boolean leapYear​(int year)
      Helper method for calculating if it is a leap year. A year is given and the method will calculate if the year is a leapYear or not.
      Parameters:
      year - to be checked for leap year.
      Returns:
      true if it is a leap year, false if not a leap year.

    • getNumber

      public java.lang.String getNumber()
      Allows other classes to access the book's serial number.
      Returns:
      the number of the book.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Allows other classes to access the book's name.
      Returns:
      the name of the book

    • getCheckedOut

      public boolean getCheckedOut()
      Allows other classes to access the books checked out status.
      Returns:
      if checked out, false if not checked out.

    • getDatePublished

      public Date getDatePublished()
      Allows other classes to access the books published date.
      Returns:
      Date Object that holds date published information.

    • setNumber

      public void setNumber​(java.lang.String sNum)
      Allows other classes to set the serial number of the book.
      Parameters:
      sNum - String number that will be the new book serial number.

    • setName

      public void setName​(java.lang.String sName)
      Allows other classes to set the name of the book.
      Parameters:
      sName - String name that will become the name of the book.

    • setCheckedOut

      public void setCheckedOut​(boolean sCheckedOut)
      Allows other classes to set the checked out status of the book.
      Parameters:
      sCheckedOut - boolean value to set if book is checked out or not.

    • setDatePublished

      public void setDatePublished​(Date sDatePublished)
      Allows other classes to set the Date Published of the book.
      Parameters:
      sDatePublished - Date Object that contains the year,month, and day.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Checks if two books objects have the same serial code.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      obj - passed a pointer to a book object.
      Returns:
      true if serial code of two books are the same, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Used to convert all the information of the Book object into a string.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      String containing all the information of the book separated by ::
